name: InstallTestCompleteAdapter
description: Installs the modules required to run TestComplete tests by using Visual Studio Test tasks. You can add a Visual Studio Test task after this task and specify a TestComplete project suite (.pjs) as a test source.
author: SmartBear Software

inputs.name: preferredExecutor
inputs.label: Preferred test runner
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether TestComplete or TestExecute will run tests on an agent if both products are installed. If only one product is installed, it will run the tests by default.

inputs.name: logsLevel
inputs.label: Save logs for

options.1: Failed tests and tests with warnings

inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies when a TestComplete log should be attached to a test result.
